DIP1ENG01 / DIP102
English in IT
Semester 2, 2025
Assignment No : 1
Release Date : 28/04/2025
Due Date : 28/05/2025
Value : 30% of final total
Assessment Type : Individual Assignment
SECTION A (70 MARKS)
Recommended completion: 30
th
 June 2025
Write a persuasive essay of approximately 500 words on the topic below. You must have a clear stance and use
supporting evidence from reliable sources to justify your claim. 
Should the Malaysian government ban short-term rentals and homestays that are offered under the Airbnb
platform? 
Note: “Airbnb is an online marketplace that connects people who want to rent out their homes with people
who are looking for accommodations in specific locales” (Folger & Howard, 2021).
SECTION B (30 MARKS)
Recommended completion: 30
th
 June 2025
Adopted from: https://grist.org/transportation/8-years-into-americas-e-scooter-experiment-what-have-we-learned/
Write a formal email in response to the issue in the photograph above (approximately 200 words).
